name: Spellbinding Sweets
description:
Spellbinding Sweets was made for 10 Day Themed Game Jam #9. For the full experience, please play the browser version in fullscreen (note the HTML version does not have audio, this is a unity issue, but the downloadable executable does).

In this game you play as a wizard (male or female) and you bake spell cookies for customers. The game currently ends after you serve seven customers, and will show you your overall score.

The controls for the game are all click-and-drag mechanics. Customers will enter from the left side of the screen and you click a button to take their order. To take the order click anywhere on the screen (this also applies for receiving your score after selling a cookie)
